Welcome, Dark Web Traveler

You have entered the abode of the Singing_Sailing_Man, a peaceful Dark Web territory of random odds and ends I find of intrigue and value. Be sure to bookmark this page in your TOR browser of choice and check back often. It's updated with interesting new information and links as I find them.

Bookmark This Page: http://jmd3ovvdxwf3zmsdpqgq4yyyine4mj4mepdeeb6jpopl3b3bn2c3xpyd.onion/

Things You Should Know

  • This site is NOT mobile friendly and I have no plans to change that. Please do not browse TOR on your phone.
  • This site is NOT available on the Clear Web. You'll only find this amazing content from within TOR. Sorry for the inconvenience. If anybody is running a Clear Web mirror of this, it isn't me, and I don't endorse their content.
  • Things are not always as they seem. Do not trust anybody.

My Current Status

"Now no one can pay rеnt, 'cause they can't afford to live thеre. A playground for the one-percent, so put the middle class on welfare. Just pour the sparkling wine, ignore the burning pines. You sold our birthrights, but you made a couple dollar signs."

Zero Tolerance Content Policy

While the Dark Web may normally be known as a hub of basement dwelling bottom-feeders, rest assured, you won't find their rubbish on this site. Below are a few things I have zero-tolerance for. If you're looking for this kind of content, delete this bookmark and scram. This spot isn't for you.

  • CSAM, also sometimes referred to as "child porn" or "CP". If you're into this, please get help immediately.
  • Oppression of widows, orphans, and strangers.
  • Racism. Both of the hard-right immigrant hating kind, and hard-left wokester kind. Don't be an idiot.
  • Any and all forms of real-life violence that isn't in explicit self-defence. Life is precious. Period. Act like it.



You (my website visitor) and I are but two ships passing in the night. May we show each other common grace, solidarity, and good will as we go about our journey on this Dark Web.

Your Friend,

— Singing_Sailing_Man
